value:
Tropical islands are home to birds of
all shapes, sizes, and colors. Oh!
Doesn't that one look like Yune?

When our long battle is finally over,
I'd love to return here with the Dawn
Brigade for some rest and relaxation.

The tropical sun shines brightly for
everyone, regardless of who they are
or where they are from.

I can't remember when I last wore
an outfit this revealing. I'm sure
Sothe has his own thoughts on it...

A tropical paradise really does make
you feel alive. It's no stretch to call it
a blessing from the goddess herself.

I'm Micaiah, of the Dawn Brigade.
Care to join me on a tropical island
retreat with $Nf?

With the cool summer breeze at my
back, I feel like I can do anything!

The tropical sunlight isn't as blinding
as it was before... Good. I may have
gotten used to it.
My throat...is parched...

Thank you. I won't forget this
summer for as long as I live.

I'm Micaiah, of the Dawn Brigade.
The winds of paradise have led me
to these seaside sands.

I had another vision... In it, I foresaw
that I would soon experience the
"winds of paradise."$k$pOnly now do I understand that those
winds are in fact the pleasant breeze
blowing through this tropical island.$k$pI don't just feel the wind on my skin.
It invigorates me deep down in my
heart and speaks to my soul.$k$pI only wish that there was a way
to share this feeling with everyone.
Wouldn't that be wonderful?$k$pPerhaps, once all the fighting has
come to an end, we can find a way to
do just that.$k$pUntil then, I will etch the time I've
spent here into my memory and
redouble my efforts to ensure peace.
はっ
いくわよ
きゃあっ
冷たい…！
Summer at last!
Time for a swim!
A memory to cherish!
Let's see who wins!
Let me catch my breath…
うふふ
Thank you for inviting me to the beach. I can't wait to enjoy the sea and sunshine!
Oh! Sorry, I just didn't see you there!
I hear some beautiful fish were spotted near shore. Let's go look!
The sand is so hot! Much hotter than I expected. Oh, my feet...
Phew! There's so much to do here. I think I overdid it...
Oh, I wonder what Sothe would think if he saw me dressed like this.
My memories of this beautiful place… And the time I spent with you… I will always treasure them.
Mm-hm.
It's so hot...
Let's have some fun!
